title: My club disappear, but it still exist
body:
I'm leader at club with name Engineers and tag Engr. 
But, today I see my club diassapear. 
I asked someone from my club what happened with club, because I saw he still has tag from club, but I not. 
He said that I'm still leader, but I appear offline in club, but in game I'm online. Someone from RIOT can help me?

replies.body:
Yes, we can help resolve this if you write in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can investigate further.

Let me know if you have issues submitting your ticket.
